column4: medzo,$x_1$ meditates about $x_2$ using practice/method/study $x_3$,,experimental gismu,,medzo,,
column5: melmi,$x_1$ is a honey produced by $x_2$,,experimental gismu,,melmi,,
column6: menre,$x_1$ is/are among the referent(s) of $x_2$,See also {me}.,experimental gismu,among,menre,,
column7: mespo,$x_1$ reflects Mesopotamian geography/chronology/culture/language/identity in aspect $x_2$,This word could be applied to post-Islamic time periods, but it probably strongly connotes cultures and/or time periods of antiquity. See also: .{alcamacrike}, {lusto}, {bablo}, {sumro}, {xakto}, {semto}, {xrabo}.,experimental gismu,Mesopotamian,mespo,,
column8: metfo,$x_1$ (bridi) is a metaphor/figurative expression having literal meaning $x_2$ to observer $x_3$,See {sinxa}, {smuni}, {sidysmu}, {tanru}, {pevna}, {pe'a}, {ve} {lujvo}, {cimjvo},experimental gismu,metaphor,metfo,,
column9: metro,$x_1$ is localized public transport system for city/metropolitan region/locale/region $x_2$ using infrastructure/facilities/means of transportation $x_3$.,This is mostly just to reserve the gismu space for "metro", which is begging to be made into a gismu; this may not be the best definition for the word space. Need not be a subway/underground train system.,experimental gismu,hyperloop,infrastructure,metro,public transit,public transportation,subway,metro,,
column10: megbivysamsle,$se1$ is (close to) a million of eight indivisible, most basic computer subunits of computer $se2$; se1 is a megabyte,In binary a megabyte is actually 1 048 576 bytes, but we can round off for brevity, and to parallel the metric units.,lujvo,megabyte,,,
column11: megdje,$d1$ is $d2$ full megadays (million day unit) in duration (default is 1 megaday) by standard $d3$,For use with metric dating system.,lujvo,megaday,,,
column12: megygra,$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ tonne(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.,Cf. {megdo}, {grake}.,lujvo,tonne,,,
column13: meirmoi,$x_1$=$moi_1$ is the $x_2$-th element out of $x_3$ elements from set $x_4$=$moi_2$=$mei_2$.,$x_3$ is the total number of elements in set $x_3$. Cf. {mei}, {moi}.,lujvo,,,,
column14: me'ispe,$s_1$ is a sister's spouse of $m_2$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $sp_3$.,Omit $x_4$=$s_2$=$m_1$. Cf. {speni}, {bunspe}, {tubyspe}, {speme'i}.,lujvo,sister-in-law,sister's spouse,spouse of sister,,,
column15: meizma,$x_1$ is more numerous than $x_2$; $x_1$ has a greater cardinality than $x_2$,Synonymous with {sormei}. See also {mei}, {memkai}, {zmadu}, {dubmau}.,lujvo,more numerous,,,
column16: mejgu'e,$x_1$ is the Malaysia country, for people $x_2$,Syn. {gugdemuje}. See {meljo}, {gugde},lujvo,Malaysia,,,
column17: mejru'u,$r_1$ is measured in malaysian ringgit (MYR) as $r_2$ (quantity), in the Algerian monetary system $r_3$.,,lujvo,ringgit,,,
column18: mekfancu,$x_1$ is an operator/mathematical function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_2$ to range $x_3$ defined by mathematical expression/rule $x_4$.,,lujvo,operator,,,
column19: mekna'u,$x_1$ is the value of expression $x_2$ in base/convention $x_3$.,See also {ju'u},lujvo,value,,,
column20: meksu'i,$x_1$ is an operand of operator $x_2$ filling place $x_3$ under rules/convention $x_4$.,,lujvo,operand,,,
column21: memjdika,$x_1$ decreases in number by amount $x_2$,See also {memyze'a},lujvo,decrease,,,
column22: memkai,$x_1$ is/are $x_2$ (li) in number, and are among $x_3$,This definition is based on the BPFK definition of {mei}. See also {mei}.,lujvo,cardinal count,,,
column23: memlai,$x_1$ numbers/adds up to/consists of $x_2$ (number) counting by units $x_3$; $x_1$ are $x_2$ in number.,See {mei}, {klani}. Syn. {zilkancu},lujvo,number,,,
column24: memymau,$x_1$ is/are more in number than $x_2$,,lujvo,more,,,
column25: memyme'a,$x_1$ is/are fewer in number than $x_2$,,lujvo,fewer,,,
column26: memyze'a,$x_1$ increases in number by amount $x_2$,See also {memjdika},lujvo,increase,,,
column27: mencre,$c_1$=$m_2$ (person) is intelligent/smart by standard $c_3$.,Cf. {menli}, {certu}, {bebna}, {pensi}, {crexalbo},lujvo,apt,brainy,bright,brilliant,clever,intelligent,smart,,,
column28: menryjinvi,$x_1$ considers/opines $x_2$ to be among $x_3$,See also {menre}, {jinvi}, {kancu}.,lujvo,count,,,
column29: menseigauka'e,$x_1$=$k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2$=$ms_1$ and $x_3$=$ms_2$ under conditions $x_4$=$k_3$,,lujvo,,,,
column30: mei zei ni'orsu,$x_1$ is a part of Lojban text representing rule 'paragraphs' according to the first edition of the book 'The Complete Lojban Language'.,Inner structure of the rule: paragraph (NIhO+ # paragraphs)?. For the description of the syntax see {jarnezi}.,zei-lujvo,,,,
column31: mekseia,$x_1$ is a part of Lojban text representing rule 'mex-operator' according to the first edition of the book 'The Complete Lojban Language'.,Inner structure of the rule: SE # mex-operator | NAhE # mex-operator | MAhO # mex /TEhU#/ | NAhU # selbri /TEhU#/ | VUhU #. For the description of the syntax see {jarnezi}.,fu'ivla,,mekseia,,
column32: meksota,$x_1$ is a part of Lojban text representing rule 'mex' according to the first edition of the book 'The Complete Lojban Language'.,Inner structure of the rule: mex-1 (operator mex-1)* | FUhA # rp-expression. For the description of the syntax see {jarnezi}.,fu'ivla,,meksota,,
column33: mektika,$x_1$ is a part of Lojban text representing rule 'operand' according to the first edition of the book 'The Complete Lojban Language'.,Inner structure of the rule: operand-1 ((ek | joik) stag? KE # operand /KEhE#/)?. For the description of the syntax see {jarnezi}.,fu'ivla,,mektika,,
column34: meltoni,$x_1$ is (a quantity of) melatonin,,fu'ivla,melatonin,meltoni,,
column35: mein,Maine (U.S. state),The U.S. state of Maine. See also {nu'ampcr}, {vrMANT}/{vyrMANT}, {masyTCUsyts}, {kyNErykyt}, {roDAIlynd}, {nuUINglynd}.,cmevla,Maine,,,
column36: me'ei,Article for abstract predicate sumti. Turns a selbri into an abstraction with all open places filled by {ce'u}.,Has an inverse: {me'au},experimental cmavo,the predicate,,,,LE
column37: me'ei'o,mekso n-ary operator: interleave sequences,Given the ordered input of m sequences a_i wherein the jth term is a_(i,j), the output is a sequence z with the nth term z_n = a_(n % m, 1 + (n - n % m)/m), where "n % m" is the remainder of division/modulus of n by m.,experimental cmavo,interleave sequences,,,,VUhU
column38: me'e ma,sumti question asking for a name; who?; requires quoted name as an answer.,,cmavo-compound,with what name?,,,,BAI*
column40: menfau,$f_1$=$m_1$ (event) is a mental event that happens/occurs/takes place in a/the mind of $m_2$; x1 is an incident/happening/occurrence of thought/dream/feeling/realization or any other mental activity .,,lujvo,mental event,,,
column41: menmakfa,$x_1$ is psychic magic/power to $x_2$ performed by $x_3$.,,lujvo,psychic,,,
column42: menmikce,$m_1$ is a psychologist/psychiatrist/counsellor/mental health practitioner of client $m_2$ treating ailment $m_3$ with treatment $m_4$.,Cf. {menli}, {mikce}, {menske}, {jikske},lujvo,counsellor,mental health practitioner,psychiatrist,psychologist,,,
column43: menmle,$x_1$=$melbi_1$=$menli_2$ has a mind that is beautiful to $x_2$=$melbi_2$ in aspect $x_3$=$melbi_3$.,menli1 place removed. See {menli}, {melbi}, {sepre}.,lujvo,,,,
column44: menmuvgau,$g_1$=$me_1$ telekinetically / with its mind moves $mu_1$ to destination/receiver $mu_2$ [away] from origin $mu_3$ over path/route $mu_4$,Made from {menli}+{muvgau}.  {menli}2 dropped on account of irrelevancy.  See also {gasnu}, {klama}, {litru}, {makfa}, {menli}, {muvdu}.,lujvo,telekinesis,telekinetically,,,
column45: menrirci,$x_1$ (person) is neurodivergent in property/aspect $x_2$ (ka) among members of $x_3$.,$x_1$ has a brain that functions in ways that diverge significantly from the dominant societal standards of "normal." This is a broad term: it includes autism, dyslexia, schizophrenia, Tourette syndrome, ADHD, et cetera.,lujvo,neurodivergent,,,
column46: menseigau,$x_1$ distinguishes / differentiates / discriminates between $x_2$ and $x_3$,Neutral sense of "discriminate". See {terdrata}, {ficpei},lujvo,differentiate,discriminate,distinguish,tell apart,,,
column47: menseika'e,$x_1$=$k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2$=$ms_1$ and $x_3$=$ms_2$ under conditions $x_4$=$k_3$,,lujvo,Distinguishable,,,
column48: menske,$s_1$ (mass of facts) is mental science/psychology about subject matter $s_2$ based on methodology $s_3$.,Cf. {menli}, {saske}, {bi'armenske}, {menmikce}.,lujvo,psychology,,,
column49: menskeplitcica,$x_1$ uses reverse-psychology/psychologically-based trick $x_2$ (abstraction; instance or idea of the trick) against $x_3$ in order to effect $x_4$.,$x_2$ need not be 'reverse'.,lujvo,psychological trick,reverse psychology,reverse-psychology,,,
column51: menynunda'a,$n_1$ is psychological warfare on the part of $d_1$.,,lujvo,psychological warfare,warfare,,,
column52: menytcaci,$t_1$ is the psychological disposition of $t_2$=$m_2$.,Cf. {tcaci}, {seltra}, {selzu'e}, {selpre}.,lujvo,disposition,,,
column53: menzi'u,$z_1$ is purple (mental combination of red and blue) [color adjective].,Created to distinguish between purple as a mental construct and violet as a place on the physical color spectrum. See {gusyzi'u}.,lujvo,purple,,,
column54: merbau,$m_1$=$b_1$ is the American English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).,Cf. {ritybau}, {gliglibau}, {glibau}, {bangenugu}, {bangu}, {merko}, {glico},,lujvo,American English,,,
column56: mergu'e,$m_1$=$g_1$ is the United States of America.,Cf. {merko}, {gugde}, {gugde'usu}.,lujvo,America,United States of America,USA,,,
column57: merja'a,$m_1$=$j_1$ is a president of the United States of America.,Cf. {merko}, {jatna}, {nolraitru},lujvo,POTUS,president of the US,United States president,US president,,,
column58: merje'a,$j_1$=$m_1$ is the United State of America as a state.,A U.S. state, or any part of a federation is referred to as {gugypau}. Cf. {merko}, {jecta}, {bemro}.,lujvo,,,,
column59: merjinme,$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of americium [Am],,lujvo,,,,
column60: merkadno,$m_1$=$k_1$ reflects angloamerican culture/nationality/geography/language in aspect $m_1$=$k_1$.,Pertaining to the United States and Canada. Cf. {merko}, {kadno}, {bemro}, {bemjoitco},lujvo,angloamerican,Canadian-US,US-Canadian,,,
column62: mertru,$t_1$ is a government of the United States of America.,Cf. {merko}, {turni}, {merja'a},lujvo,US government,,,
column65: metnidytcika,$x_1$ (number) is the second/second notation of the minute, of event/state $x_2$, in system $x_3$.,{cacra} zei {mentu} zei {tcika}. As default, the number $x_1$ is counted from the first second of the minute. See {ti'u'i} for BAI. ex.) li voxa cu metnidytcika lo nu samymri ti mi kei u'y ty cy (This was e-mailed to me at 46 seconds past the minute UTC.),lujvo,second of the minute,,,
column66: mexri'osanso,$s_1$  is a mexican salsa verde  [sauce] for use with $s_2$, containing ingredient(s) including $s_3$.,,lujvo,salsa verde,,,
column67: mexru'u,$r_1$ is measured in mexican peso (MXN) as $r_2$ (quantity), in the Mexican monetary system $r_3$.,,lujvo,peso,,,
column68: mexybau,$m_1$=$b_1$ is the Mexican Spanish language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).,from {mexno} {bangu} c.f. {sanbau}.,lujvo,Mexican Spanish,,,
column70: mexyxeksanso,$s_1$  is a mexican salsa negra [sauce] for use with $s_2$, containing ingredient(s) including $s_3$.,,lujvo,salsa negra,,,
column73: mi'arckasu,$cm_1$=$ck_1$ (mockingly) laughs at $ck_2$ about $ck_3$ (property/event).,See also: {mi'afra} (to laugh at something, not neccessarily mockingly), {cisma}, {ckasu}.,lujvo,to laugh at sb.,to laugh down sb.,to twit,,,
column74: mi'arpe'u,$p_1$ (agent) tickles $p_2$ with $p_3$ (a locus on $p_1$ or an instrument) at $p_4$ (a locus on $p_2$).,Cf. {mlisa'e}, {tikpa}.,lujvo,tickle,titillate,,,
column75: mi'arta'i,$t_1$=$c_1$ is tired/hurting/in stitches from laughing; $t_1$=$c_1$ laughs so hard it hurts.,Typical pain loci include the cheeks and abdomen. Some may also cry. Cf. {cortu}, {klaku}.,lujvo,in stitches,,,
column77: mibmanri,$x_1$ is a first-person perspective (frame of reference), observing $x_2$, with rules $x_3$,See {mi}, {manri}, {mibma'o},lujvo,first-person perspective,,,
column78: mibma'o,$c_1$ is a first person pronoun in language $c_4$.,Cf. {mi}, {mi'a}, {ma'a}, {mi'e}, {cmavo}, {donma'o}, {sevzi}, {se'a}, {se'i}, {se'o}.,lujvo,1st person pronoun,first person pronoun,pronoun for first person,,,
column81: mibykla,$x1$=$k1$ comes to me from $x2$=$k3$ via route $x3$=$k4$ by means $x4$=$k5$,,lujvo,come,,,
column82: mibypre,$m_1$=$p_1$ is me.,Used instead of {mi} when a brivla is needed.,lujvo,I,me,myself,,,
column83: micka'agau,$m_1$=$g_1$ uses surgical implement $k_1$ to operate on organ(s) $k_2$ of patient $m_2$, as a treatment for ailment $m_3$.,Cf. {mikce}, {katna},lujvo,operate,surgery, perform,,,
column84: micka'aku'a,$k_1$ is an operating theatre in which to perform surgery $m_4$.,Cf. {mikce}, {kumfa}, {micka'agau}, {spita},lujvo,operating room,operating theatre,OR,surgery,,,
column85: micra'a,$x_1$ is related to medical treatment/science/practice, or is medicinal, or is medical, or is related to healthcare, or is related to the practice/occupation of medicine or being a medical practitioner (doctor, nurse, midwife, pharmacist, technician, etc.; also: psychologists, psychiatrists, physical therapists, physicians, veterinarians, hospital administrators, vel sim.), or pertains to hospitals or caregiving, concerning general class of subjects/patients $x_2$ or ailment/body-part $x_3$ or form of treatment/care $x_4$.,No implication that the subject is human. For veterinarian, $x_2$ is non-human animals in general or some subset thereof. Dentistry, orthodontics, optometry, epidemiology, etc. all are included. Plant or agricultural science related to taking care of ailing plants or preventing their ailments is included ($x_2$ is plants (and possibly fungi)). All reproductive or fertility sciences or services, excepting sex work or similar, are included; obstetrics and reproductive health are included; family planning, abortion services, and contraception science or services are included. Palliative, hospice, and euthanization care are included. Mental health and wellness care, in the form of therapy or similar, is included. This list is not exhaustive.,lujvo,healthcare,medical,medicine,,,
column86: micydi'u,$d_1$ is a clinic/surgery/practice with doctor(s) $m_1$.,Cf. {mikce}, {dinju}, {spita},lujvo,clinic,practice,surgery,,,
column87: micynimre,$x_1$ is a citron (Citrus medica) of type $x_2$,See {nimre}, {mikce},lujvo,citron,,,
column88: micyske,$x_1$=$s_1$ (mass of facts) is medical science based on methodology $x_2$=$s_3$.,,lujvo,medical science,medicine,,,

column76: melplin,Name:  Saturn,A {jvocmevo} meaning "{melbi} {plini}", or "beautiful planet".  Named so because, in the words of astronomer Phil Plait, "when you ask astronomers or astronauts what got them started, what was the very first thing that happened to them to inspire them to do what they do, overwhelmingly, they will tell you: 'I saw Saturn through a telescope'".  See also {xavyplin} {remsol} {stoplin} {vidyplin} {remted} {remlur} {xunplin} {balplin}.,cmevla,Saturn,,,

column102: latpre,$x_1$ is a catperson/(catgirl/catboy).,A person with cat features: usually cat ears and/or a tail and/or cat-like behavior. Gender-neutral version of {latxli}.,lujvo,catboy,catgirl,catperson,,,
column104: latxli,$x_1$ is a catgirl,A girl with cat features: usually cat ears and/or a tail and/or cat-like behavior.,lujvo,catgirl,,,
column105: latydja,$c_1$ is cat food for cats $c_2$=$m_1$.,See also pet food (={dalpe'odja}).,lujvo,cat food,,,
column106: latyrebla,$x_1$ is a cat tail of $x_2$,See {mlatu}, {rebla}.,lujvo,cat tail,,,
column107: lauble,$r_1$=$c_1$ sounds quiet/weak at observation point $c_2$ by standard $c_3$=$t_3$.,Cf. {cladu}, {ruble}, {smaji}, {cmato'a}.,lujvo,quiet,weak,,,
column109: laurmi'a,$x_1$=$cm_1$=$cl_1$ loudly laughs; loud at observation point $x_2$=$cm_2$ by standard $x_3$=$cm_3$. $x_1$=$cm_1$=$cl_1$ is literally laughing out loudly.,,lujvo,to loudly laugh,,,
column110: la'uske,$x_1$=$s_1$ (mass of facts) is limnology based on methology $x_2$=$s_3$.,,lujvo,freshwater science,limnology,,,
column111: lausku,$cu_1$=$cl_1$ shouts $cu_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $cu_3$ via expressive medium $cu_4$, loudly by standard $x_5$=$cl_3$.,Cf. {laurba'u}, {smasku}, {smaba'u}.,lujvo,shout,,,
column113: laxma'i,$x_1$ is October of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.,Cf. {pavnonmasti}, {kanbyma'i}, {nanca}.,lujvo,October,,,
column114: laxtyminli,$x_1$ is $x_2$ (li; default: 1) galactic units (i.e.: the average distance between the center of the Milky Way galaxy and the center of Sol system) by standard $x_3$.,This word uses experimental gismu veljvo "{laxte}". Analogous to "{solminli}"; on the scale of the kiloparsec ({ki'ortanminli}).,lujvo,galactic unit,SolSgr A* distance,,,
column116: lazdu'i,$x_1$ and $x_2$ are members of the same family,{lazyki'i} and {lazmi'u} have similar meanings. See {lanzu} and {dunli}.,lujvo,relative,,,
column117: lazme'e,$c_1$ (quoted word(s)) is the family name (as opposed to the given name) of family member $c_2$=$z_2$, used by namer/name-user $c_3$. The family is bonded/tied/joined according to standard $z_3$.,See also {lanzu}, {cmene}, {du'acme}.,lujvo,family name,last name,name,,,
column118: lazmi'u,$x_1$ is a family relative of $x_2$,See {lanzu}, {mintu},lujvo,relative,,,
column119: lazmro,$x_1$ (family, taxon, clade) is extinct/extirpated.,Applies to standard human families as well as to clades/taxa. Add conditions in order to yield "extirpated from ...".,lujvo,extinct,extirpate,,,
column120: laznynavni,$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of argon (Ar).,See also {lazni}, {navni}; {ratni}.,lujvo,Ar,,,
column121: lazycange,$c_1$ is a family farm/ranch at $c_2$, farmed by family $c_3$=$l_1$ (mass), raising, producing $c_4$.,,lujvo,family farm,,,
column122: lazycme,$x_1$ (text) is the name of family $x_2$ (partial set/list of individuals or, better, a graph structure) by name-user $x_3$.,$x_2$ is not an individual; it is a structure which includes, explicitly or implicitly, every individual who belongs to the family (at least, enough to bear the name implicitly according to $x_3$). $x_1$ need not be part of the official name of any individual in $x_2$; it is just a way by which to refer to $x_2$ as a whole.,lujvo,familial name,familial surname,family name,last name,patronymic,surname,,,
column124: lazyzda,$z_1$ is the home of family members $z_2$=$l_2$.,Cf. {lanzu}, {zdani}.,lujvo,home,,,
column125: lazyzukykei,$k_1$ (agent) plays house.,A child's play to emulate parents.,lujvo,,,,
column126: le'avla,$v_1$ is a loanword meaning $v_2$ in language $v_3$ based on foreign-language word $l_2$.,Old, deprecated synonym for {fu'ivla}. Could be considered an {u'ivla}.,lujvo,,,,
column129: lecycersai,$s_1$ (mass) is a brunch (breakfast-lunch) composed of dishes including $s_2$.,,lujvo,brunch,,,
column130: lecyde'i,$d_1$ is a/the wisdom tooth of $d_2$,See also {ka'arde'i}, {gerde'i}, {crazalde'i}, {zalde'i}.,lujvo,wisdom tooth,,,
column131: lecydo'i,$d_1$=$l_1$ is the afternoon of day $d_2$ at location $d_3$.,,lujvo,afternoon,,,
column132: ledgrute,$g_1$ is a mushroom of species $g_2$.,,lujvo,mushroom,,,
column133: ledycilta,$x_1$ is a mycelium of $x_2$,See also {mledi}, {cilta},lujvo,mycelium,,,
column134: leicmi,$x_1$ is a member of class / category $x_2$ (mass / plurality), within supergroup $x_3$, with defining quality $x_4$,See {klesi}, {cmima}, {kleinzu},lujvo,member of category,member of class,,,
column135: le'ipli,$pi_1$=$pl_1$ employs $pi_2$=$pl_3$ for a payment/compensation/salary/wage/reward of $pl_2$ for the provision of goods/services $pi_3$=$pl_4$.,From: {pleji}, {pilno}. Cf. {seljibri}.,lujvo,employ,,,
